endOfBusinessProcess

public void endOfBusinessProcess()
The purpose of this point-cut is to mark the end of drivers license business process.

endOfBusinessProcess

public void endOfBusinessProcess(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint jp)
The purpose of this advise is to define the behavior at the end of business process for the fraud protection. This method constructs a message for fraud protection and then passes it across the bridge code. This method also constructs a message for system management log and passes it across the ecs service.

Parameters:
jp - the joint point at the end of business process
